message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1800000 for it. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1900000. Let me know if this is something you'd be comfortable with!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to counter with $1750000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm glad we're having a good negotiation. However, I'm not quite ready to meet your price yet. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1850000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to consider $1800000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

I think we're getting close, Bob! I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm not quite ready to meet your price at $1800000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $1850000. Let's see if we can finalize the deal!
